item.title: Hugo Incorporated Features
item.description: Incorporated provides a great typography, responsive design, author details, semantic markup and more. You can set customize post covers, and other things directly in the post front matter: Configurable & Code Snipped Highlighting Highlighting requires pygments, and to use the hugo-incorporated highlight style, pygmentsuseclasses: true must be in your site config. /assets/stylesheets/main.scss: /* Font for headings */$fontheadings:"Droid Sans","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;/* Text colors */$text:#21272d;$textmuted:#848484;$accent:#2077b2;config.yml: Zoomable images Awesome quotes Stay tuned for updates.
